Name: Project Apocalypse
About the game: Post-apocalyptic city builder with zombies and cubes. Build a camp for survivors. Improve and upgrade it with different buildings. Craft and trade items. Protect your camp from the infected. Survive. Current state Alpha version. All the basic game mechanics and systems are there, but they need to be expanded and improved with content. Survival mode - build your base, gather resources, defend against the infected Sandbox mode - feel free to experiment! Basic AI (work, social, combat) for survivors Character needs, health, inventory, combat systems 1 huge map to explore with random generation for each playthrough Production system Order-based control system for your survivors Different buildings and decorations for your camp Roadmap More buildings. Social, Industry, leisure, defense, and other categories. Detailed character needs and stats. Hunger, stress, comfort, and more. Management system. Different jobs and orders. Improved AI. Different behaviors, character archetypes. Trade and Industry system. Produce and trade goods with other camps (AI-controlled) Three game modes. Infinite Survival, Objective-based Missions, and Sandbox. Camp decoration and customization system, so you can make it truly Your camp. Improved visuals and sounds. Powergoals Raids. Gather a raid party and sent it to different dangerous places. Interactive Text Events and mini-quests Character skills and leveling Missions
